articles.title: Indian Railway Finance Corporation Q2 profit surges 14% to Rs 1,714 crore - Business Standard
articles.description: The cumulative funding to the Indian railway sector by IRFC has crossed Rs 505 trillion mark by the end of the Q2 FY23
articles.content:
Indian Railway Finance Corporation (IRFC) on Thursday reported a 14 per cent increase in its profit at Rs 1,714 crore in the second quarter ended September 30, 2022.
